author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The purpose of this PR is to include in `cmssw` the necessary code to automatically produce within the harvested DQM file the final efficiency plot vs layer number, so that it can be extracted from ROOT files directly instead of re-running the harvesting manually.

#### PR validation:

Run the following command:

```
cmsRun stepHarvest -s ALCAHARVEST:SiStripHitEff --conditions 124X_dataRun3_Express_v9 --scenario pp --data --era Run3 --dasquery='file dataset=/StreamExpress/Run2022G-PromptCalibProdSiStripHitEff-Express-v1/ALCAPROMPT run=362437' -n -1 --customise_commands='process.alcasiStripHitEfficiencyHarvester.isAtPCL = cms.bool (False)'
```

and obtained the following plots:
   * from the current setup
   
![Summary](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/206156005-3496d486-3f91-4901-9f15-cebc05852604.png)

   * to be compared with the content of the DQM root file:
   
![Screenshot from 2022-12-07 11-34-50](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/206156371-71ada326-d2c6-4dde-a747-e4ac91ca583c.png)
